languages.text: "Не кутайся в синее, Идира. Каждому из нас выпали свои испытания, с которыми мы... мы боролись как могли".
"Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."
languages.original_text: "Не кутайся в синее, Идира. Каждому из нас выпали свои испытания, с которыми мы... мы боролись как могли".

traits.locale_text: "Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."
"Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."
"Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."
"Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."

languages.text: “别让蓝色笼罩着你，伊迪拉。我们每个人都有各自的考验……我们都尽了我们最大的努力。”
languages.original_text: "Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."

traits.locale_text: “别让蓝色笼罩着你，伊迪拉。我们每个人都有各自的考验……我们都尽了我们最大的努力。”

languages.text: « Ne vous laissez pas envahir par le bleu, Idira. Chacun d'entre nous a vécu des épreuves... et y a résisté du mieux qu'il le pouvait. »
languages.original_text: "Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous laissez pas envahir par le bleu, Idira. Chacun d'entre nous a vécu des épreuves... et y a résisté du mieux qu'il le pouvait. »

languages.text: «No dejes que el azul te engulla, Idira. Todas hemos tenido nuestras pruebas a las que... hemos hecho frente lo mejor que hemos podido».
languages.original_text: "Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."

traits.locale_text: «No dejes que el azul te engulla, Idira. Todas hemos tenido nuestras pruebas a las que... hemos hecho frente lo mejor que hemos podido».

languages.text: 「青に包まれないでください、イディラ。私たちはそれぞれ試練を与えられたのです…最善を尽くして戦いました」
languages.original_text: "Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."

traits.locale_text: 「青に包まれないでください、イディラ。私たちはそれぞれ試練を与えられたのです…最善を尽くして戦いました」

languages.text: "Lasst Euch nicht vom Blau umhüllen, Idira. Jeder von uns hatte seine Prüfungen, durch die wir ... durch die wir uns bestmöglich hindurchgekämpft haben."
languages.original_text: "Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst Euch nicht vom Blau umhüllen, Idira. Jeder von uns hatte seine Prüfungen, durch die wir ... durch die wir uns bestmöglich hindurchgekämpft haben."

languages.original_text: "Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."

languages.text: "Mavinin seni sarmasına izin verme İdira. Hepimiz savaşlar veriyoruz, elimizden geldiğince savaşmaya devam ediyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Do not let the blue envelop you, Idira. We each had our own trials that we... we fought through as best we could."

traits.locale_text: "Mavinin seni sarmasına izin verme İdira. Hepimiz bazı savaşlar veriyoruz, elimizden geldiğince savaşmaya devam ediyoruz."
